links.label: has syndic
links.definition: In general, a syndic is someone’s agent or attorney, with power to act on their behalf. In the case of the Parisian stock sales, the syndic is the target person in charge of selling off the previous owner’s books at the source parisian_stock_auction. In the case of a bankruptcy, they are the liquidator; in the case of a death, they are the executor.

links.label: is part of
links.definition: The source parisian_stock_sale was part of the target parisian_stock_auction.

links.label: confiscates
links.definition: The target edition was confiscated by the authorities.

links.label: stamps and legalises
links.definition: The source estampillage stamps the target edition as legal.

links.label: is
links.definition: The source novel in the MMF 2 database is the target edition.

links.label: sells
links.definition: The source parisian_stock_sale is a sale of the target edition.

links.label: licenses publication of
links.definition: A license was issued to publish the target edition under the permission_simple.

links.label: inspects
links.definition: The target edition was inspected by the authorities at the source provincial_inspection.

links.label: is usually linked hierarchically to
links.definition: The source fbtee_keyword can be considered a subcategory of the target fbtee_keyword, though not always.

links.label: is associated with
links.definition: The source fbtee_keyword shares meaning with the target.

links.label: has keyword
links.definition: The source super_book has been assigned the target fbtee_keyword in the FBTEE keyword system.

links.label: is part of
links.definition: The confiscated books from source confiscation were in the target packet.

links.label: is branch of
links.definition: The source parisian_category is always a subcategory of the target parisian_category.

links.label: has parisian category
links.definition: The source super_book has been assigned to the target parisian_category in the Parisian booksellers’ classification system.

links.label: condemned by
links.definition: The target person is the authority responsible for the source condemnation (usually a corporate entity).

links.label: is person
links.definition: The source fbtee_keyword refers to the target person.

links.label: has agent
links.definition: The target person placed the order on behalf of the true recipient.

links.label: signed for by
links.definition: Currently this cannot be defined. SB is inspecting the source material and working out what the different signatures represent.

links.label: censored by
links.definition: The target person was the censor responsible for confiscating the books.

links.label: inspected by
links.definition: The inspecting authority at the source provincial_inspection was the target person.

links.label: is bound for
links.definition: The books inspected in the source provincial_inspection were being sent to the target person.

links.label: is primarily written by
links.definition: The target person was one of the primary authors of the source edition. Primary authors are the persons mainly responsible for writing the text of the work.

links.label: is secondarily written by
links.definition: The target person was one of the secondary authors of the source edition. A secondary author is a person who contributes part of the text of the work (e.g. by making revisions to the text, or by writing a continuation, or by contributing a chapter/preface/section etc.)

links.label: is translated by
links.definition: The target person was one of the translators of the source translated edition.

links.label: is edited by
links.definition: The target person was one of the editors of the source edition.

links.label: has adjoint
links.definition: The target person is present at the source parisian_stock_auction to assist the syndic.

links.label: has auctioneer
links.definition: The target person is an auctioneer at the source parisian_stock_auction.

links.label: has previous owner
links.definition: The target person is the dead or bankrupt individual whose books are being sold at the source parisian_stock_auction.

links.label: ostensibly published by
links.definition: According to the source edition’s imprint, the target person was the publisher.

links.label: actually published by
links.definition: Despite what the source edition’s imprint claims, the target person was actually the publisher.

links.label: is placed by
links.definition: The target person placed the source order at the Societe Typographique de Neuchatel.

links.label: confiscated from
links.definition: The books were confiscated from the target person.

links.label: is bought by
links.definition: The target person bought the books involved in the source parisian_stock_sale.

links.label: grants publishing licence to
links.definition: The target person received the publishing licence under the source permission_simple grant.

links.label: is member of
links.definition: The source person is a member of the target person. The target person is a corporate entity, and the source person is either a human individual involved in the corporate entity, e.g. as a partner or employee, or the source person is a subsidiary of the target.

links.label: has correspondent
links.definition: The target person was the writer or receiver of the target STN:correspondence.

links.label: is sent via
links.definition: The source order was sent to the target place or person on the way to its final destination. In FBTEE-1 terms, the target person is a ‘middleman’.

links.label: permits dealer
links.definition: The target person received a licence to sell the stamped items of an estampillage.

links.label: inspected by
links.definition: The target person was the inspector at the source estampillage. The inspector was a centrally-appointed government agent dispatched to oversee the local book trade. Each local booksellers’ guild received an inspector under the estampillage legislation.

links.label: adjoint at
links.definition: The target person was the adjoint at the source estampillage. The adjoint appears to have been a member of the local booksellers’ guild who accompanied and assisted the inspector.

links.label: takes place in
links.definition: The source parisian_stock_auction took place in the target place.

links.label: ostensibly published in
links.definition: According to the source edition’s imprint, the target place was the where it was published.

links.label: actually published in
links.definition: Despite what the source edition’s imprint claims, the target place was actually where it was published.

links.label: is sent to
links.definition: The target place is the order’s final destination.

links.label: from
links.definition: The packet of confiscated books arrived from the target place.

links.label: is from
links.definition: The source person operates from target place.

links.label: inspected in
links.definition: The source provincial_inspection took place in target place.

links.label: has profession
links.definition: The source person has target profession.

links.label: is for
links.definition: The source transaction is the purchase, sale, dispatch or return of the target edition.

links.label: is part of
links.definition: The source transaction was part of the target order. A transaction is the exchange of a particular edition. An order usually contains several transactions.

links.label: is part of
links.definition: The source volume_set was exchanged as part of the target transaction.

links.label: recognises as illegal
links.definition: The source record recognises the target super_book as an illegal title. None of these sources is a legal instrument that actually bans a book.

links.label: manifests
links.definition: The source edition ‘manifests’ the target super_book in FRBR terms. It is a physical instantiation of the abstract ‘work’.

links.label: condemns
links.definition: The source condemnation judges the target super_book (or less frequently a target edition) to be illegal, and may or may not enact some penalty against it (recorded in the condemnation’s attributes, see below).

links.label: has tag
links.definition: The source fbtee_keyword is a subcategory of the target tag.
